trans-unit.source: An XML element that configures the security for a service with endpoints that receive HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 요청을 수신하는 끝점으로 서비스의 보안을 구성하는 XML 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpSecurityElement" /> class.
Gets an XML element that specifies the security mode for a basic HTTP service.
trans-unit.target: 기본 HTTP 서비스의 보안 모드를 지정하는 XML 요소를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A value of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode" /> that indicates whether transport-level security or no security is used by an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 끝점에서 전송 수준 보안을 사용하는지 아니면 보안을 사용하지 않는지를 나타내는 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode" />의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether the settings from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property becomes effective.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성은 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> 속성의 설정이 유효한지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode" />.
Gets an XML element that indicates the transport-level security settings for a service endpoint configured to receive HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 요청을 수신하도록 구성된 서비스 끝점의 전송 수준 보안 설정을 나타내는 XML 요소를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpSecurityElement" /> that specifies the transport-level security settings.

The default values set are a <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ClientCredentialType" /> of <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.HttpClientCredentialType.None" />, a <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.ProxyCredentialType" /> of <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.HttpProxyCredentialType.None" />, and <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.HttpTransportSecurity.Realm" /> = "".
Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpSecurityElement> object returned by this property to set the transport security parameters.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성에서 반환하는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpSecurityElement> 개체를 사용하여 전송 보안 매개 변수를 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode> must be set to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.Transport> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.TransportCredentialOnly> value for the settings provided by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> property to become effective for the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode>는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.Transport> 속성에서 제공하는 설정의 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode.TransportCredentialOnly> 또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurity.Transport%2A> 값으로 설정되어야 서비스 끝점에 유효합니다.

trans-unit.source: This value can be set in configuration or in the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 이 값은 구성에서 설정하거나 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding.%23ctor%28System.ServiceModel.WebHttpSecurityMode%29> 생성자에서 설정할 수 있습니다.
